# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport-belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
-  Make sure to refuel burner entities when they run out of fuel

### Errors when using entities that require ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them
-  Make sure to provide the required ingredients to entities when they run out

### Errors when using entities that require connection
-  Ensure that entities are connected to the required networks before using them
-  Make sure to connect entities to the required networks when they are not connected

### Errors when using pipe groups
-  Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before using them
-  Make sure to fill pipe groups when they are empty

### Errors when using electricity groups
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before using them
-  Make sure to plug electricity groups into the electric network when they are not plugged in

### Errors when using belt groups
-  Ensure that belt groups are not empty before using them
-  Make sure to fill belt groups when they are empty

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables defined by the agent were found in the execution logs.
